column1: 16:36|They watched their friend through the glass cover; the heaving of the chest became less and less
column3: while a purple hue settled upon his body. At thirty-six minutes past four
column4: the last division of the wheel had been reached.|A.D. 2000|Alvarado M. Fuller

column1: 16:36|It was after four-thirty when they arrived at the old Red Bull Playhouse in upper St. John Street
column2: and the performance had been under way for more than an hour. The theatre was hot and stuffy
column4: and it smelt strongly of sweat and unwashed bodies and powerful perfumes.|Forever Amber|Kathleen Windsor
